trans-unit.source: A ModelProperty represents a property on a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.

Model properties are associated with an instance of an item, which allows them to have simple Value get/set properties instead of using the more cumbersome GetValue/SetValue mechanism of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
The value of a ModelProperty may come from a locally set value, or it may be inherited from somewhere higher up in the element hierarchy.

Use the <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A> property of the value returned by <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value%2A> to determine the source of the property value.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty"></xref>.

Returns the type that defines this property if <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.IsAttached*> returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns a <xref:System.Type> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns the attributes declared on this property.
Returns the attributes as an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"></xref>.
Clears the local value for the property.
When there is no local value set for the property, a value may be inherited from higher in the property hierarchy.
If you wish to set the value to `null`, call <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue%2A> instead.
Returns <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value*> cast as a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
If the property value is not a collection, this property will return `null`.
Returns the property value as a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns the currently computed value for this property.
Setting a value on this property is the same as calling <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue*>, but can be used in data binding expressions.
Returns the computed value as an <xref:System.Object>.
Returns the type converter to use with this property.
Underlying type converters are all wrapped so they accept <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> objects.
When performing a conversion to a particular value, the type converterâ€™s return type is not wrapped.
Type converters that return standard values also return values as <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> objects.
Returns a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for use with this property.
Returns the default value for this property.
If the property does not define a default value, this will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns an <xref:System.Object> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value*> cast as a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"></xref>.
If the property value is not a dictionary, this property will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Determines the equality for properties.
Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.
The property to compare with this property.
if obj is a that equals this property; otherwise, .
Serves as a hash function for a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty"></xref>.
Returns a hashcode as an <xref:System.Int32>.
Determines whether the property represents an attached property from a different type.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property represents an attached property from a different type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the property can be shown in a property window.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property can be shown in a property window; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the value contained in the property is a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value contained in the property is a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the value contained in the property is a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value contained in the property is a <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItemDictionary>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the property is read only.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is read only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the value of the property is set locally.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the property is set locally; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the name of this property.
The name of this property.
Determines whether the properties are equal.
Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.
The first property.
The second property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the first property equals the second property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the properties are unequal.
Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.
The first property.
The second property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the first property equals the second property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Returns the parent of this property.
Returns the parent of this property as a <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem>.
Returns the data type of the property.
Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the property.
Sets a local value on a property.
If `value` is not a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>, it is wrapped in a <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem>, which is returned to the caller.
It is valid to set `value` to `null`, in which case <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value%2A> will be `null`.
This is different from calling <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.ClearValue%2A>.
> [!NOTE] > Using this method, the value will not be set on the underlying property until the editing context completes.
To update the underlying property immediately, use <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ArgumentAccessor.Setter%2A>.
The new value to set.
Returns value as a .
Returns the value set into this property.

A property may return a value that is inherited further up the element hierarchy, in which case this property will return a value whose <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A> is not `this`.
If no value has ever been set for the property Value will return `null`.
Returns the property value as a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
